byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and BEN SISARIO

abstract: Robert W. Pittman, the chairman of Clear Channel's media and entertainment business, will also replace Mark Mays as executive chairman.
snippet: Robert W. Pittman, the chairman of Clear Channel's media and entertainment business, will also replace Mark Mays as executive chairman.

headline.main: Clear Channel Names Pittman as Its Chief
headline.print_headline: Clear Channel Media Chief Agrees to Take the Helm
